content:
The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine thanked Finland for joining the Czech initiative to purchase 800,000 artillery ammunition for Ukraine.

About thisReportsTwitter defensive department.

“Finland will provide € 30 million for the purchase of artillery shells for Ukraine within the Czech initiative we are grateful to our Finnish partners for this important decision and adamant support. Together we will win! ” - The message says.

As reported by the Armyinform, the Portugal's government approveda contribution of 100 million eurosIn the Program of support of Ukraine, which was offered by the Czech Republic.

In addition, Belgium is allocated 200 million euros on Czech initiative for ammunition for Ukraine.

The Czech Republic found 500,000 units of artillery ammunition and another 300,000 Soviet caliber units. The ammunition is out of the European Union and could be bought, for which the Czech Republic started raising funds.

Currently, one and a half dozen countries, including Germany, France, the Netherlands, Canada and others, have already joined the Czech initiative.
title: Finland provides 30 million euros to Ukraine for the purchase of shells within the Czech Initiative
